name: Sometimes Living is the most painful part
reviewBody: You Know I Wonder sometimes why it takes Film or A Play To Make You See what's Clearly in Front Of You. This Movie so Deeply affects you on so Many Levels. As An African American Man, I Sat and Watched this Movie With My family And My Heart Broke, I'm not ashamed to say it brought me to tears. The Performacees in this Movie Will Haunt you Deeply, I Think.....No I believe That If The United States Had Done Something That The Countless and Needless Slaughter Would Have Been Stopped Dead in it's Tracks. We As Americans Need To Hold Our Politcians and Military Leaders Accountable for Their Actions or As I Should Really Say Non-action. We Are The Free World So We Say At a Moment's Notice Without Even Thinking About it, But Doesn't Freedom Include the right To Live......This Movie Will Rock Your soul. I believe Debra Winger And The Cast of this Movie Should take the Emmy Easily. This Movie Is a Powerhouse of Emotion, It's Not Pretty, It Doens't have a Nice Little Ending, It's Painful Yet Inspiring, Because My Friends This Movie Inspires You To Love Your Self And Your Family that Much More, Because You Just Might Not Make it to See another day. I Give this Movie a 10/10 Amazing
